DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine SAF312 eye drop adequate safety efficacy profile justify clinical development treatment ocular pain associate corneal epithelial defect photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) surgery
DOC.brief_title: Study SAF312 Eye Drop Treatment Eye Pain Following Photorefractive Keratectomy ( PRK ) Surgery
DOC.criteria: Normal eye exam except refractive error baseline . Myopia exceed 4.00 Diopters ( sphere ) 3.00 diopter astigmatism , spherical equivalent high 4.50 , confirm manifest refraction baseline . Monocular patient ( include amblyopia ) best correct visual acuity score bad 20/80 ( Snellen ) 55 letter ( EDTRS ) , baseline . Any systemic ocular disease might affect wound healing ( severe rheumatoid arthritis diabetes history keloid formation ) history ocular trauma , uveitis , infection , inflammation 6 month prior baseline . Previous refractive corneal surgery ( LASIK , PRK , radial keratotomy , pterygium removal , corneal transplantation ) . Chronic pain etiology significant illness resolve within two ( 2 ) week prior initial dosing . Other inclusion exclusion criterion apply .
